key_changes: Current phase changed from 'API Endpoints' to 'Integration & Verification'
Quick start guide with 3 steps for verification
Next steps for server restart and browser verification
Automated verification script with color-coded output
Checks for all 27 endpoints across 5 entity types

patterns_discovered.description: Creating verification documentation before operational steps, separating code verification from runtime verification
instances: SUBTASK_5-2_SUMMARY.md emphasizes code is complete but server restart needed
patterns_discovered.value: Separates development tasks from operational tasks, clarifying completion criteria

patterns_discovered.description: Multiple levels of documentation for different audiences (quick start, detailed guides, automated scripts)
instances: HOW_TO_VERIFY_API_DOCS.md: Quick 3-step guide for rapid verification
patterns_discovered.value: Serves different user needs from quick verification to detailed understanding

patterns_discovered.description: Endpoints grouped by entity type with consistent CRUD patterns
instances: Templates (6 endpoints), Subsections (5), Items (5), Instances (6), Responses (5)
patterns_discovered.value: Makes API surface easy to understand and navigate

patterns_discovered.description: Using checkboxes and status indicators throughout documentation
instances: [ ] unchecked items for pending operational steps
patterns_discovered.value: Clear visual indication of completion and pending tasks

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Code Complete vs. Runtime Ready Distinction
gotchas_discovered.description: API documentation code is fully implemented but invisible until server restart. Task marked complete at code level, not operational level.
gotchas_discovered.context: The subtask was marked SUCCESS despite requiring server restart for verification, because the coding portion is complete

gotchas_discovered.description: FastAPI generates OpenAPI spec at server startup, so new endpoints won't appear until backend is restarted
gotchas_discovered.context: Verification script checks running server, not code; will fail until restart despite code being correct

gotchas_discovered.description: Documentation mentions Hebrew examples as 'optional enhancement' not required criteria
gotchas_discovered.context: Verification passes without Hebrew text examples, but they could improve internationalization support

gotchas_discovered.description: Nested objects in schemas use forward references that only resolve when FastAPI processes the models
gotchas_discovered.context: Schemas are correctly typed but relationships won't visually appear in Swagger until server processes them

key_achievements: All 27 API endpoints implemented and verified in code
15 Pydantic schemas with proper validation and typing
Router properly registered with correct tags
3 levels of verification documentation created (quick guide, detailed guide, automated script)
Clear distinction between code completion and runtime verification

recommendations.recommendation: Execute server restart: docker-compose restart backend
recommendations.rationale: Required to load new routes into running OpenAPI spec

recommendations.recommendation: Run verify_api_documentation.py after server restart to confirm all criteria pass
recommendations.rationale: Automated validation ensures all 27 endpoints are properly documented

recommendations.recommendation: Add Hebrew language examples to schema Field definitions (optional)
recommendations.rationale: Would improve internationalization support and serve Hebrew-speaking developers
Ensures API documentation remains complete through future changes

recommendations.recommendation: Archive the 3 new documentation files as templates for future verification tasks
recommendations.rationale: Reusable pattern for endpoint documentation verification in other features
